Utility Classes¶

CEventArgs¶

class SurveyManager.utility.CEventArgs¶

This class represents custom event args classes.

class DBArgs : public EventArgs¶

Event args representing when a database connection is done connecting.

class DBObjectArgs : public EventArgs¶

Event args representing when a search in the database has been finished.

class FileUploadDoneArgs : public EventArgs¶

Event args representing when a file upload is done.

class FilterDoneEventArgs : public EventArgs¶

Event args representing when a filter is done searching.

class LicensingEventArgs : public EventArgs¶

Event args representing when the license engine is finished licensing.

class ObjectCreatedEventArgs : public EventArgs¶

Event args representing when an object is created.

class QueryRanArgs : public EventArgs¶

Event args representing when a query is ran against the database.

class StatusArgs : public EventArgs¶

Event args representing when the status label is updated.

class SurveyOpenedEventArgs : public EventArgs¶

Event args representing when a survey is opened.

CFileTypeConverter¶

class SurveyManager.utility.CFileTypeConverter : public TypeConverter¶

Converts a CFile object into a string for use in a property grid.

class SurveyManager.utility.CountyTypeConverter : public TypeConverter¶

CSVHelper¶

class SurveyManager.utility.CSVHelper¶

This class is used to create comma-seperated value files. Mainly, it used to dump the database data.

JobHandler¶

class SurveyManager.utility.JobHandler¶

This class handles all tasks relating to survey jobs. It is responsible for opening, closing, keeping track of the current job, saving, and updating the recent docs for surveys.

This class cannot be instantiated. Instead, it must be referenced through its single Instance property.

project

Survey Manager

members

protected-members

private-members

Mail¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Mail¶

Static class that facilitates sending email. Mail can be sent using the various Send methods.

A valid MailInfo structure is required before attempting to send email. Thus, it is recommended to call Initialize before any other methods.

project

Survey Manager

protected-members

private-members

Pair¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Pair<K, V>¶

Generic class to represent a single Key, Value pair.

tparam K

The key type

tparam V

The value type
